name: Indoor Soccer
overview: Indoor soccer is a standard five-on-five soccer game on the computer. It is a two-player game only as there is no one-player vs. the computer option. With it being an indoor arena that the players play in, there is no out-of-bounds or throwing in which makes the gameplay much faster and easier. Players also don't have to concern themselves with offsides as it's not possible to do during gameplay.
